message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
Your share is decreasing faster than mine. Let's be reasonable. This is a good deal for you.
I'll take a smaller share than before, but still more than you offered
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is my final offer above 50%.  Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm offering a perfectly even split. You're losing more to inflation with every wasted round. Let's be smart and take the win.
